name: Defense Against the Dark Arts
description: Understanding and defending against dark magic, curses, and hexes.

lessons.name: Introduction to Dark Arts
lessons.description: Overview of dark magic, its history, and key characteristics.

lessons.name: Defensive Spells
lessons.description: Learning spells and counter-curses to defend against dark forces.

lessons.name: Dueling Techniques
lessons.description: Techniques and strategies for magical duels against dark practitioners.

name: Potions
description: The study of potion making, including the properties of magical ingredients and their effects.

lessons.name: Basic Potion Making
lessons.description: Introduction to basic potions and their ingredients.

lessons.name: Advanced Potions
lessons.description: Crafting advanced potions with complex effects and uses.

lessons.name: Potion Safety and Ethics
lessons.description: Safe practices in potion making and ethical considerations.

name: Transfiguration
description: Mastering the art of changing the form and appearance of objects and beings.

lessons.name: Basic Transfiguration
lessons.description: Fundamentals of altering physical properties and appearances.

lessons.name: Animal Transfiguration
lessons.description: Techniques for transfiguring objects and oneself into animals.

name: Charms
description: Learning enchantments for spell-casting that alters properties or behaviors of objects or individuals.

name: Herbology
description: Study of magical and mundane plants and fungi, understanding their properties and uses.

name: Astronomy
description: The study of stars, planets, and celestial phenomena in the magical world.

name: History of Magic
description: Exploring the history of the magical world, from ancient times to the modern era.

name: Care of Magical Creatures
description: Understanding and caring for magical creatures, both common and rare.
